messages.body: $AAPL LCD screens are a potential answer to consumers' complaints about rising iPhone costs. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-will-use-cheaper-screens-to-lower-iphone/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Will Use Cheaper Screens To Lower iPhone Costs
links.description: Released last year, the Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) iPhone X represents the pinnacle of the tech titan's smartphone lineup. At $999 for the base model, it also represents the pinnacle of price, which is alienating many consumers unwilling to plunk down a thousand dollars for a smartphone.

links.title: Is Oracle Corporation's Drop Your Chance to Load Up?
links.description: Shares of Oracle Corporation (NYSE:) haven't been trading too well, tumbling some 5% on June 14. While ORCL stock started to recover as the week ended, some investors have to be wondering if this is a buying opportunity. At the root of the sell-off were a pair of somewhat negative analyst takes.
